item.title: 马斯克旗下X平台因Grok传播性深伪内容遭欧盟调查
item.description: 埃隆·马斯克旗下的X平台因未能阻止其Grok人工智能聊天机器人散布"可能构成儿童性虐待材料"的深度伪造图像，正面临欧盟调查。【原文：Elon Musk’s X has been hit by a European Union probe over concerns it failed to prevent its Grok AI chatbot from spewing out deepfake images “that may amount to child sexual abuse material.”】

item.title: 意大利光纤集团Retelit考虑出售价值7亿欧元的数据中心
item.description: 据知情人士透露，意大利光纤运营商Retelit SpA正考虑出售其数据中心业务，该交易可能使该部门估值高达7亿欧元（约合8.23亿美元）。【原文：Italian fiber carrier Retelit SpA is considering a sale of its data-center business in a deal that could value the unit at as much as €700 million ($823 million), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 沙特阿美启动今年首次债券发售，油价持续低迷
item.description: 沙特阿美正启动今年首次债券发售，此时油价仍远低于平衡沙特阿拉伯预算所需的水平。【原文：Aramco is launching its first bond sale of the year, just as oil prices remain well below levels needed to balance Saudi Arabia’s budget.】

item.title: 货币贬值交易正将金价推向令人眩晕的高度
item.description:
随着交易员撤出主权债券和货币市场，金价突破每盎司5000美元大关。

【原文：

Gold surpasses $5,000 an ounce as traders pull back from sovereign bonds, currencies.

】

item.title: 数据中心激增背后隐藏着碳排放源
item.description:
科技公司正转向使用绿色混凝土，以帮助减少数据中心建设带来的巨大环境足迹。【原文：

Tech companies are turning to green concrete to help reduce the massive environmental footprint of building out data centers.

】

item.title: 美国国防类股暴涨面临盈利现实检验
item.description: 全球地缘政治秩序日益动荡，近月来为军工承包商股价注入强劲动力。随着业内巨头本周即将公布财报，投资者正迫切寻求证据，以验证这轮涨势是否具有实质基础。【原文：An increasingly unstable global geopolitical order has turbocharged stocks of military contractors in recent months. Now, with some of the biggest names in the industry set to report earnings this week, investors are eager for evidence that the rally is rooted in reality.】

item.title: 尼日利亚信贷担保机构为基础设施筹集7.03亿美元
item.description: 尼日利亚InfraCredit公司计划在未来四年内将其奈拉担保额增加三倍以上，押注于放宽杠杆规则和降低借贷成本将有助于为这个西非国家的基建项目解锁长期融资。【原文：Nigeria’s InfraCredit plans to more than triple its naira guarantees over the next four years, betting that looser leverage rules and easing borrowing costs will help unlock long-term funding for infrastructure projects in the West African nation.】

item.title: 赫尔辛与斯塔克有望赢得德国无人机订单，莱茵金属则落后
item.description: 据知情人士透露，德国防务初创企业赫尔辛和斯塔克防务公司即将各获得价值3亿欧元的军方订单，为驻立陶宛的德国装甲旅提供盘旋式武器。而德国本土防务巨头莱茵金属公司此次将暂时落选。【原文：German defense start-ups Helsing and Stark Defence are set to receive military orders worth €300 million each to deliver loitering munitions for a German armored brigade in Lithuania, while local giant Rheinmetall AG will be passed over for now, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 海湾国家一月份借贷狂潮持续，亚洲助力推波助澜
item.description: 海湾国家1月份加速发行债券，因投资者转向新兴市场。亚洲需求推动了这一增长，中国银行跻身交易管理人名单，而美国贷款机构的影响力正在减弱。【原文：Gulf countries accelerated bond issuance in January as investors shifted toward emerging markets. The increase was partly driven by Asian demand, with Chinese banks making it to the roster of deal managers amid waning influence from US lenders.】

item.title: 韩国9900亿美元养老基金将削减海外股票配置
item.description: 韩国国民年金服务公司今年将削减海外股票配置，同时小幅提高国内股票配置比例，以调整投资组合应对韩国综合股价指数的飙升和韩元贬值。【原文：South Korea’s National Pension Service will trim its exposure to overseas stocks this year, while marginally raising its domestic equity allocation, recalibrating its portfolio in response to the Kospi’s blistering rally and the won’s decline.】

item.title: 坎帕表示，欧洲银行业规则改革应超越AT1范畴
item.description: 欧盟计划简化银行规则时，必须明确未来资本需求，避免过度关注次级债务，一位高级监管官员表示。【原文：European Union plans to simplify bank rules must make future capital needs clear and avoid fixation on subordinated debt, a top watchdog said.】

item.title: 普华永道在禁令解除后重启沙特公共投资基金项目竞标工作
item.description: 据知情人士透露，普华永道高管已要求团队重启与沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金的业务洽谈。此前这家咨询公司在该重要市场遭禁一年的处罚即将结束。【原文：PwC executives have asked teams to resume pitching for work with Saudi Arabia’s wealth fund, according to people familiar with matter, as the one-year ban on the consulting firm in an important market comes to an end.】

item.title: 暴风雪引发德国及北欧地区预警
item.description: 暴风雪和冰冻天气袭击欧洲北部和东部地区，导致交通和电力系统瘫痪。气象预报显示，未来两周该地区将持续严寒天气。【原文：Heavy snow and ice hit northern and eastern Europe, disrupting transport and power systems as freezing conditions are forecast for the next two weeks.】

item.title: 菲律宾呼吁保持冷静，官员与中国特使发生争执
item.description: 菲律宾外交部表示，已就两国在南海主权争议问题上部分官员与中国大使馆之间日益激烈的公开交锋，表达了"严重关切"。【原文：The Philippines’ Department of Foreign Affairs said it has conveyed its “serious concerns” over escalating public exchanges between some officials and the Chinese embassy over the two nations’ competing claims in the South China Sea.】

item.title: 日本央行账户未显示明确迹象表明日本上周五干预日元汇率
item.description: 日本数据未显示明确迹象表明，东京当局上周五曾出手干预市场买入日元——这是自2024年7月以来首次采取此类行动。【原文：Japanese data offered no clear sign that authorities in Tokyo stepped into the market last Friday with yen-buying intervention for the first time since July 2024.】

item.title: 七国集团财长将于周二讨论稀土与乌克兰问题
item.description: 法国将于周二在其担任主席国期间主持召开七国集团财长会议首次会议，预计讨论重点将围绕保障关键原材料供应及持续支持乌克兰展开。【原文：France will hold the first meeting of Group of Seven finance officials under its presidency on Tuesday, with discussions expected to focus on securing supplies of critical raw materials and continued support for Ukraine.】

item.title: 赞比亚股市上涨有望推动2026年IPO及新黄金ETF上市
item.description: 赞比亚股市今年将迎来多家新上市公司，同时还将推出一款黄金挂钩的交易所交易基金（ETF），旨在把握贵金属上涨行情。【原文：Zambia’s stock market is preparing to host several new stock listings this year, as well as a gold-linked ETF that aims to tap into the precious metals rally.】

item.title: 德国商业景气指数意外下滑，因经济增长疲软
item.description: 德国年初的商业前景有所下滑，尽管政府承诺将进行大规模投资，但经济依然疲软。【原文：Germany’s business outlook slipped at the start of the year with the economy still lackluster despite the promise of big government investments to come.】

item.title: 俄罗斯诺里尔斯克镍业公司在中国铜冶炼厂项目面临延迟
item.description: 俄罗斯诺里尔斯克镍业股份公司（MMC Norilsk Nickel PJSC）在中国南部沿海地区建设的铜冶炼厂项目面临延迟，因其当地合作伙伴已退出该项目。【原文：Russia’s MMC Norilsk Nickel PJSC faces a delay in building a copper smelter on China’s south coast, after its local partner withdrew from the project.】

item.title: 打造全球最大银行之一的必备要素
item.description:
与PNC金融服务集团首席执行官的对话

【原文：

A conversation with the CEO of PNC Financial.

】

item.title: 零股投资：PNC银行德姆查克谈如何壮大顶级银行（播客）
item.description: 经济领域的一个重大趋势是：大企业持续壮大。 在科技领域可见一斑：市值巨大的软件公司持续跑赢中小同行；金融业亦然：全球顶尖银行在行业内的份额不断扩大。纵观多个领域，规模效应带来的显著优势正持续累积。但登顶之巅需要何种条件？规模与体量究竟带来哪些实质性优势？PNC金融服务集团便是行业巨擘之一。【原文：One of the mega-themes of the economy is that the big keep getting bigger. You see it in technology, where the megacap software companies are outperforming their smaller peers. And you see it in finance, where the world’s biggest banks keep growing their share within the industry. Across multiple fields, there are clear advantages to size and scale that keep accruing. But what does it take to get to the very top, and what are the real advantages to size and scale? PNC Financial is one of the big】

item.title: 沙特考虑扩大高端居留权网络以吸引超级富豪
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯正考虑扩大其高端居留计划的优惠范围，将更多高净值人士和超级游艇船主纳入适用对象，以吸引更多人才和资本流入该国。【原文：Saudi Arabia is considering plans to extend perks offered under its premium residency program to a wider range of candidates including high-net-worth individuals and owners of super yachts as the kingdom seeks to draw in more talent and capital.】

item.title: 贝恩资本支持的EcoCeres在马来西亚建厂押注清洁航空燃料
item.description: 由贝恩资本支持的可持续燃料制造商EcoCeres公司正考虑扩大其可持续航空燃料业务版图，该公司押注随着成本下降和脱碳法规收紧，市场需求将持续增长。【原文：EcoCeres Inc., a Bain Capital-backed sustainable fuel maker, is considering expanding its sustainable aviation fuel footprint as it bets on demand rising as costs fall and decarbonization rules tighten.】

item.title: 兰特兑美元汇率首次突破16关口，创2022年以来新高
item.description: 南非兰特兑美元汇率升至16兰特兑1美元以上，创近四年新高。随着美元走弱，全球投资者对风险资产的偏好推动兰特延续涨势。【原文：South Africa’s rand strengthened past 16 per dollar for the first time in almost four years, extending a rally fueled by global appetite for riskier assets as the US currency retreats.】

item.title: 空客要求员工为地缘政治风险和新危机做好准备
item.description: 空客公司正为员工应对即将到来的动荡之年做准备，因为2026年初仍笼罩在美国与其他国家之间地缘政治紧张局势的阴影下。【原文：Airbus SE is preparing its employees for a turbulent year ahead as geopolitical tensions between the US and other countries hang over the start of 2026.】

item.title: OPEC+代表称3月可能维持暂停增产政策
item.description: 欧佩克+代表表示，该组织将于周日召开会议，目前预计将维持下月保持原油产量稳定的计划，以应对全球原油过剩及一系列地缘政治风险。【原文：OPEC+ delegates said they’re currently expecting to stick with plans to keep oil production steady next month when they meet on Sunday, as the group deals with a global surplus and a wave of geopolitical risks.】

item.title: 中国卡车科技初创企业深威在港股上市前融资1.72亿美元
item.description: 深威科技公司是一家中国重型卡车技术制造商，在计划于香港首次公开募股之前，已完成约12亿元人民币（合1.73亿美元）的融资。【原文：DeepWay Technology Co., a Chinese company that makes technology for heavy-duty trucking, has raised about 1.2 billion yuan ($173 million) in a funding round ahead of a planned Hong Kong initial public offering.】

item.title: 津巴布韦去年外汇汇款增长14%，达24.5亿美元
item.description: 去年，旅居海外的津巴布韦人向这个南部非洲国家汇回了24.5亿美元，较2024年增长14%。【原文：Zimbabweans living abroad sent $2.45 billion back to the southern African nation last year, a 14% increase over 2024.】

item.title: 富兰克林邓普顿将Alcentra并入Benefit Street Partners
item.description: 富兰克林邓普顿正将其欧洲私募信贷部门Alcentra并入美国同业Benefit Street Partners LLC，标志着这家曾经赫赫有名的直接贷款公司艰难时期的终结。【原文：Franklin Templeton is folding its European private credit unit Alcentra into its US counterpart Benefit Street Partners LLC, marking the end of a difficult period for the once-prominent direct-lending firm.】

item.title: 加泰罗尼亚暂停列车服务，西班牙铁路担忧加剧
item.description: 加泰罗尼亚地区的列车服务于周一暂停，此前本月早些时候发生的两起致命事故引发了对西班牙铁路系统安全的担忧，导致服务中断持续多日。【原文：Train services in Catalonia were suspended Monday, extending days of disruption after two deadly accidents earlier this month raised concerns about the safety of Spain’s rail system.】
